name: Death Pipe X
description:
Simple, easy to start, cute and dynamic timekiller. Surf with high speed along an endless tube filled with dangerous obstacles. Try to make alive as long as you can, dodging blocks and other whimsical constructions. The game score will be record automatically. You could upload your achievements and compete with other players.
- Colorful HD graphics
- Dynamic changing game play
- Endless game mode
- Collect game coins for trade interesting props
- Accelerometer control or screen touch
- Built-in score record and show off
- Performance fully compatible with some older devices
